text: Volkswagen Golf Variant is a car produced by Volkswagen since 1993. It entered its fourth generation in 2009. == First generation (1993–1999) == === Engines === ==== Petrol engines ==== * 1.4 44 kW (60 hp) * 1.6 74 kW (101 hp) * 1.8 55 kW (75 hp) and 66 kW (90 hp) * 2.0 85 kW (115 hp) * 2.9 VR6 140 kW (190 hp) ==== Diesel engines ==== * 1.9 D 47 kW (64 hp) * 1.9 SDI 47 kW (64 hp) * 1.9 TD 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.9 TDI 66 kW (90 hp) and 81 kW (110 hp) == Second generation (1999–2006) == === Engines === ==== Petrol engines ==== * 1.4 16V 55 kW (75 hp) * 1.6 74 kW (100 hp) and 75 kW (102 hp) * 1.6 16V 77 kW (105 hp) * 1.6 FSI 81 kW (110 hp) * 1.8 T 110 kW (150 hp) * 2.0 85 kW (115 hp) * 2.3 V5 110 kW (150 hp) and 125 kW (170 hp) * 2.8 V6 150 kW (204 hp) ==== Diesel engines ==== * 1.9 SDI 50 kW (68 hp) * 1.9 TDI 66 kW (90 hp), 74 kW (100 hp), 81 kW (110 hp), 85 kW (115 hp) and 96 kW (130 hp) == Third generation (2007–2009) == === Engines === ==== Petrol engines ==== * 1.4 16V 59 kW (80 hp) * 1.4 TSI 90 kW (122 hp), 103 kW (140 hp), 118 kW (160 hp) and 125 kW (170 hp) * 1.6 75 kW (102 hp) * 2.0 147 kW (200 hp) ==== Diesel engines ==== * 1.9 TDI 77 kW (105 hp) * 2.0 TDI 100 kW (136 hp) and 103 kW (140 hp) == Fourth generation (2009–present) == === Engines === ==== Petrol engines ==== * 1.2 TSI 63 kW (85 hp) and 77 kW (105 hp) * 1.4 16V 59 kW (80 hp) * 1.4 TSI 90 kW (122 hp) and 118 kW (160 hp) * 1.6 75 kW (102 hp) ==== Diesel engines ==== * 1.6 TDI 66 kW (90 hp) and 77 kW (105 hp) * 2.0 TDI 100 kW (136 hp) and 103 kW (140 hp) Golf Variant Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Volkswagen Golf Variant
